name: GDL Alien ShootAR
description:
Game made in 3 days for GDL jam. Programming by me. 3D Art by Matt Devlin ( http://madlabs.me/ )

A fleet of alien spaceships are bearing down on the city. Use an array of towers to shoot down the alien ships and defend the city's population.

This is augmented reality game for Android. You will need to print this marker to play: https://developer.vuforia.com/sites/default/files/sample-apps/targets/tarmac.pdf

Game has no ending, but enemy difficulty increases with your performance.

Attributions:

UI Images: Kenney.nl

Sounds: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ts-sounds-34453 and Kenney.nl
